versions.readme:
# CdrText ### Modifiers Modifier values are any valid text styles #### Heading Styles * heading-large * heading-large-static (non responsive) * heading-medium * heading-medium-static (non responsive) * heading-small * heading-small-static (non responsive) * display * display-static (non responsive) * subheading #### Paragraph Styles * Null (default) * body #### Citation Styles * citation ```
h2 display heading Default paragraph Body paragraph citation
```
